abstract: Simon & Schuster said on Thursday that it would accelerate the publication of "Steve Jobs," the forthcoming biography by Walter Isaacson.
snippet: Simon & Schuster said on Thursday that it would accelerate the publication of "Steve Jobs," the forthcoming biography by Walter Isaacson.
lead_paragraph: Simon & Schuster said on Thursday that it would accelerate the publication of "Steve Jobs," the forthcoming biography by Walter Isaacson. The book will now be released on Oct. 24, said Tracey Guest, a spokeswoman for the publisher.
